mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Lightburn, Joseph Andrew Jackson
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling Aug 26 1861. By Telegraph from Headquarters " " 1861. Point Pleasant Va. Via Gallipolis I wrote for commissions for field officers Wm HH Russel Lieut Col and Jno J Hall Major. Please send them soon as Genl Cox wants me to report them Please answer J.A.J. Lightburn Col 4 Ca Col 32HM12Spd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Lightburn, Joseph Andrew Jackson
Point Pleasant, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
